changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO conditions (patient_id, status, concept_id, onset_date, creator, date_created, voided, uuid) SELECT o.person_id AS personId, 'ACTIVE' AS status, o.value_coded AS diagnosisConcept, Min(DATE(o.obs_datetime)) AS startDate, o.creator AS creator, now() AS dateCreated, 0 AS voided, uuid() FROM obs o JOIN concept_name codedDiagnosis ON o.concept_id = codedDiagnosis.concept_id JOIN concept_name diagnosisCodedValue ON o.value_coded = diagnosisCodedValue.concept_id JOIN obs confirmedObs ON o.obs_group_id = confirmedObs.obs_group_id JOIN concept_name confirmed ON confirmedObs.value_coded = confirmed.concept_id WHERE codedDiagnosis.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND codedDiagnosis.name = 'Coded Diagnosis' AND confirmed.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND confirmed.name = 'Confirmed' AND diagnosisCodedValue.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND diagnosisCodedValue.name IN ('HIV Infection', 'Diabetes Mellitus', 'Hypertension', 'Rheumatoid Arthritis', 'Bronchial Asthma', 'Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease') AND !confirmedObs.voided AND !o.voided GROUP BY diagnosisConcept, personId;
